attributes.action: Hold a vote of no confidence in His Majesty's Government.
attributes.additional_details: Rishi Sunak is resisting the necessary need to put the motion to end the current Parliament via the Fixed Term Parliaments Act by obnoxiously stating on television that the public doesn't want an election. He has no mandate to say that whatsoever.
attributes.background: To hold a vote of no confidence in the government and end the current Parliament.
